title: Teddy Bear Cake
description: A sweet two-tier cake adorned with fondant teddy bears, balloons, and soft pastel accents. Perfect for baby showers, christenings, or first birthdays.

title: Christmas Winter Cake
description: A rustic holiday cake with frosted pinecones, berries, and greenery, finished with a white chocolate drip. A festive centerpiece for Christmas gatherings.

title: Moana Ocean Cake
description: A vibrant ocean-inspired cake with Moana characters, sandy textures, and tropical details. Themed perfectly for adventurous birthday parties.

title: Orchid Floral Cake
description: Classic vanilla cake with smooth buttercream frosting

title: Rustic Rose Cake
description: A semi-naked cake decorated with handcrafted sugar roses in soft pink and mauve tones. A simple yet romantic design for weddings or special celebrations.

title: Jack Daniels Barrel Cake
description: A bold and unique cake styled as a whiskey barrel, complete with miniature Jack Daniels bottles and edible ice cubes. The ultimate cake for whiskey lovers.

title: Mexican Fiesta Cake
description: A colorful fiesta-themed cake decorated with buttercream ruffles, cactus toppers, and papel picado banners. A lively choice for birthdays and Cinco de Mayo celebrations.

title: Enchanted Woodland Cake
description: A nature-inspired cake with lifelike sugar flowers, leaves, and mushrooms against a wood-textured design. A magical choice for garden parties and woodland-themed events.

title: Midnight Butterfly Cake
description: A stunning black cake decorated with golden accents, delicate butterflies, and deep purple blooms. A glamorous centerpiece for elegant birthday celebrations.

title: Modern Geometric Cake
description: Clean lines and geometric patterns in fondant

title: Witchesâ€™ Cauldron Cake
description: A spooky Halloween cake bubbling with neon green slime, skulls, and witchy details. Ideal for haunted parties and themed birthdays.

title: Naruto Ramen Cake
description: A playful cake designed to look like a ramen bowl, complete with noodles, eggs, and Naruto enjoying his favorite dish. A must-have for anime fans.
